edu.cnm.deepdive

Class FizzBuzz

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.FizzBuzz

  • public class FizzBuzz
extends Object
    Includes several public methods and constants for computing FizzBuzz values.

    This class includes static methods that take int parameters and return boolean and String results, indicating whether the specified values are divisible by 3 (fizz) or 5 (buzz).

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Matthew Jones & Deep Dive Coding Java+Android Cohort 7.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BUZZ
      String value indicating a number divisible by 5.
      static String FIZZ
      String value indicating a number divisible by 3.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String fizzBuzzValue(int value)
      Computes and returns "Fizz", "Buzz", or a String representation of value, depending on whether value is divisble by 3 or 5.
      static boolean isBuzz(int value)
      Computes and returns true if value is divisible by 5, otherwise false.
      static boolean isFizz(int value)
      Computes and returns true if value is divisible by 3, otherwise false.

      • fizzBuzzValue

        public static String fizzBuzzValue(int value)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        "fizz", "Buzz", or value as a String.

        Returns:
